Commands.Name: associate
Commands.HelpText: Imports N to N relationshipts to CRM

Options.HelpText: File containing the data to import
Continue if there's an error while processing the command
Connection string, or name of a connection string to use
Xml file containing the command options
Sets the current logging output. Can be Debug, Info, Error

Commands.Name: lookup
Commands.HelpText: Updates a specific column from a data table querying data in CRM

Options.HelpText: File containing the data table with the data
Name of the column to lookup
Name of the entity where search for the data
Attributes used to know if the record exists. Default is display attribute
Columns containing the with the data to lookup. The number of columns must match the number of matching attributes
Continue if there's an error while processing the command
Connection string, or name of a connection string to use
Xml file containing the command options
Sets the current logging output. Can be Debug, Info, Error

Commands.Name: publish-all
Commands.HelpText: Publishes all existing customizations in the environment

Options.HelpText: Connection string, or name of a connection string to use
Xml file containing the command options
Sets the current logging output. Can be Debug, Info, Error

Commands.Name: delete
Commands.HelpText: Delete all the records returned by the specified query

Options.HelpText: Fetch query to retrieve the records to delete
Continue if there's an error while processing the command
Connection string, or name of a connection string to use
Xml file containing the command options
Sets the current logging output. Can be Debug, Info, Error

Commands.Name: export
Commands.HelpText: Exports an entity or query from CRM to a file

Options.HelpText: Adds the row number to each exported record
Path of the file where to save the exported data
Name of the entity you want to export
Fetch query to retrieve the records to export
Number of records to retrieve from a page
Page of records to retrieve
Connection string, or name of a connection string to use
Xml file containing the command options
Sets the current logging output. Can be Debug, Info, Error

Commands.Name: import
Commands.HelpText: Imports information from a file to Dynamics

Options.HelpText: File containing the data to import
Continue if there's an error while processing the command
Attributes used to know if the record exists. Default is id attribute
Connection string, or name of a connection string to use
Xml file containing the command options
Sets the current logging output. Can be Debug, Info, Error

Commands.Name: solution-import
Commands.HelpText: Imports the specified solution .zip file into CRM

Options.HelpText: .zip file containing the solution to import
Indicates wether the import should be performed asynchronously
Connection string, or name of a connection string to use
Xml file containing the command options
Sets the current logging output. Can be Debug, Info, Error

Commands.Name: solution-export
Commands.HelpText: Export the specified solution to a .zip file

Options.HelpText: Unique name of the solution to export
Connection string, or name of a connection string to use
Xml file containing the command options
Sets the current logging output. Can be Debug, Info, Error
